symptoms: DEF warning countdown active, limited speed, acrid exhaust odor.

root_cause_hypotheses.hypothesis: Contaminated DEF causing SCR efficiency drop
root_cause_hypotheses.evidence: Bulk DEF fill near freezing, immediate countdown, common for contaminated fluid.

root_cause_hypotheses.hypothesis: Failed NOx sensor upstream of catalyst
root_cause_hypotheses.evidence: SPN3364 often paired with aging sensors on DD15.
Freezing temps and poor DEF quality encourage deposit buildup.

most_likely_cause: Contaminated DEF reducing SCR conversion efficiency.

recommended_actions.step: Test DEF quality with refractometer and replace if outside spec
recommended_actions.why: Confirms contamination and resets countdown cause.

recommended_actions.step: Perform forced regeneration after DEF replacement
recommended_actions.why: Burns off deposits and resets SCR efficiency monitors.

recommended_actions.step: Verify NOx sensor outputs with diagnostic tool
recommended_actions.why: Ensures sensors respond correctly post-fluid change.

tools_parts: Diagnostic laptop with Detroit Diesel software
safety_notes: Wear gloves and eye protection when handling DEF.
Perform regeneration outdoors or with exhaust extraction.
warranty_or_tsb_refs: Detroit Diesel SF-17-60: DEF contamination diagnostics
disclaimers: SCR countdown may require dealer reset if fault persists after repairs.

confidence.assessment: DEF quality plus cold soak aligns with current countdown fault.

customer_readiness_check.short_reason: Plan provides tests, safety, and estimates for fleet maintenance.
